TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Suo-luo-ya-se-de, title = Suo-luo-ya-se-de, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suo-luo-ya-se-de} }

S.FORM: == Suo-luo-ya-se-de瑣羅亞斯德 == Suo-luo-ya-se-de "Si-la-yi : "Ζωροάστρης kaudipan nida kalawlawan nu katuuday, idaw ku musakamuay nuayawan tu nemtu wal mihacaan tu nuayawan aca tu limlim cay mihcaan" i cudada sa Cea-la-tu-se-te'-la "A-wi-se-tuo-yi : Zaraθuštra, yimi "idaway ku Luo-tuo a tademaw", ci Ku-puo-se maluayaway matinengay mutademaw, mipaypayan tu lamal a patidengay nu tademawan. Suo-luo-ya-se-de mihapusa A-hu-la.Ma-ce u patidengay tu di'tuan sa, sisa ci nida sadikuday mala Suo-luo-ya-se-de kiwkay a satalakaway nu di'tuan. nina kiwkay minayat tu tusa malebut lima a lasubu mihcaan. katukuh ayda idaw henay ku misinzaay nu tadeamwan. ci nida u Suo-luo-ya-se-de sakaykiwkay nu cudad "A-wi-se-ta" u "Puo-se-ku-cin" nu "Cei-tay" a misulitay nu tademaw. idaw ku kamu tu nikatabal a patay. nina naayaway a kiwkay sakamusa "A-hu-la-ciw", "Ma-ce-ta-cia", tada misinza tu satalakaway nu A-hu-la.Ma-ce-ta-ku'. :Zaraθuštra,意為" . nikaudip生平 pilecuhan nida i Mi-ti-wan-kuo " aydaay nu Yi-lan amisan" a siidaay nu misubayuay a lumaan, limucedan ku wina, caay ka tinengi ku wama. tusa ku mihcaan miliyasa ci nida tu luma' taydaan i buyu mueneng. tuluay ku mihcaan mapasakamu nu di'tu a kamuan ci nida, sumaden ku yadahay nu kiwkayan, patideng satu Suo-luo-ya-se-de kiwkay "cacaya ku kakilulen sa", nika mapaedis nu daduducan a mapalaway, katukuh tu sepatay a bataan idaw ku tusa a mihcaan, ci A-ci-mei-ni-de-ti-kuo a cay-sen siacawa tu tataynaan a wawanida, patayda han i Wi-se-ta-pa kuowan, nina kuowan mala kapahay nida a cabayan atu midiputay a tademaw, nina Suo-luo-ya-se-de kiwkay itini i Puo-se amelik satu ka tinengan nu tademaw. . kapatayan死亡 nikaudip ni Suo-luo-ya-se-de pitu a bataan idaw ku pitu nu mihcaan ku nikaudip, itini i Tu-lan atu Puo-se-ti-kuo nikalepacawan, itida ci nida i miyu Patayan nutaw a mapatay. . lalid影響 De-kuo cesyecia ci Cay-ni nisulitan tu " Ca-la-tu-se-te'-la hinisa, pangangan sasahican ku Si-la nipangangan tu Suo-luo-ya-se-de a tadangangan, idaw ku ilabuay nu imian. .

== Soo-loo-ya-se-de瑣羅亞斯德 == Soo-loo-ya-se-de "Si-la-yi : "Ζωροάστρης kaodipan nida kalawlawan no katooday, idaw ko mosakamoay noayawan to nemto wal mihacaan to noayawan aca to limlim cay mihcaan" i codada sa Cea-la-to-se-te'-la "A-wi-se-too-yi : Zaraθoštra, yimi "idaway ko Loo-too a tademaw", ci Ko-poo-se maloayaway matinengay motademaw, mipaypayan to lamal a patidengay no tademawan. Soo-loo-ya-se-de mihaposa A-ho-la.Ma-ce o patidengay to di'toan sa, sisa ci nida sadikoday mala Soo-loo-ya-se-de kiwkay a satalakaway no di'toan. nina kiwkay minayat to tosa malebot lima a lasobo mihcaan. katokoh ayda idaw henay ko misinzaay no tadeamwan. ci nida o Soo-loo-ya-se-de sakaykiwkay no codad "A-wi-se-ta" o "Poo-se-ko-cin" no "Cei-tay" a misolitay no tademaw. idaw ko kamo to nikatabal a patay. nina naayaway a kiwkay sakamosa "A-ho-la-ciw", "Ma-ce-ta-cia", tada misinza to satalakaway no A-ho-la.Ma-ce-ta-ko'. :Zaraθoštra,意為" . nikaodip生平 pilecohan nida i Mi-ti-wan-koo " aydaay no Yi-lan amisan" a siidaay no misobayoay a lomaan, limocedan ko wina, caay ka tinengi ko wama. tosa ko mihcaan miliyasa ci nida to loma' taydaan i boyo moeneng. toloay ko mihcaan mapasakamo no di'to a kamoan ci nida, somaden ko yadahay no kiwkayan, patideng sato Soo-loo-ya-se-de kiwkay "cacaya ko kakilolen sa", nika mapaedis no dadodocan a mapalaway, katokoh to sepatay a bataan idaw ko tosa a mihcaan, ci A-ci-mei-ni-de-ti-koo a cay-sen siacawa to tataynaan a wawanida, patayda han i Wi-se-ta-pa koowan, nina koowan mala kapahay nida a cabayan ato midipotay a tademaw, nina Soo-loo-ya-se-de kiwkay itini i Poo-se amelik sato ka tinengan no tademaw. . kapatayan死亡 nikaodip ni Soo-loo-ya-se-de pito a bataan idaw ko pito no mihcaan ko nikaodip, itini i To-lan ato Poo-se-ti-koo nikalepacawan, itida ci nida i miyo Patayan notaw a mapatay. . lalid影響 De-koo cesyecia ci Cay-ni nisolitan to " Ca-la-to-se-te'-la hinisa, pangangan sasahican ko Si-la nipangangan to Soo-loo-ya-se-de a tadangangan, idaw ko ilaboay no imian. .
